## Upcoming NMFS R UG Events

* [Win-Spr 2022 NMFS R UG Monthly Events Flyer](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/e/2PACX-1vSpQMBLWMdvGrxwXab2lSbPMnkARhZvB5EPcm13UeGrJ8-kai5gCKZTDsHXBQQTCswX1hWAdR-ULwPo/pub?start=false&loop=false&delayms=3000)

* **Tues Mar 8 2022 12-1pm PST. NMFS R UG Monthly Meeting** Adyan Rios (SEFSC) will talk about how the SouthEast Data, Assessment, and Review (SEDAR) is dealing with confidential data used in projects on GitHub. She'll talk about various tools and processes to prevent confidential data or secrets from being committed to repos [Add the event to your calendar](https://calendar.google.com/event?action=TEMPLATE&tmeid=NGlyNTNjYW1mYjIwODI5YWZuN29jZWw5NDggbm9hYS5nb3ZfNjByZm43bWw5cnBjaGw2M3ZzNGFmOW4wMThAZw&tmsrc=noaa.gov_60rfn7ml9rpchl63vs4af9n018%40group.calendar.google.com)
* **Tues Mar 29 2022 12-1pm PST. NMFS R UG Monthly Meeting** Erin Steiner (NWFSC) runs a data collection program where she collects cost and participation info from Commercial fishers, processors, and quota owners. She will present two types of markdown tools they have developed to QA their data and communicate with participants. Finally, she'll present some data flow challenges the team has encountered and hopefully facilitate a discussion of how others have resolved those issues.  [Add the event to your calendar](https://calendar.google.com/event?action=TEMPLATE&tmeid=M21lc3YxdjdzM201NG9pcTRuYjNqZDJyMHQgZW1pbHkubWFya293aXR6QG5vYWEuZ292&tmsrc=emily.markowitz%40noaa.gov)

## Other Events

* Tues Feb 22 2022 1-2pm Eastern, Bureau of Labor Statistics invites fellow federal R User Groups to their monthly meeting: Intro to Time Series & Serial Correlation, Stationary & Non- Stationary Variables in R. Please check the NMFS R UG Group Chat or NMFS R UG calendar for the web link. Pre-registration not needed.
* Wed Feb 23 2022 1-5pm Eastern. PSAW III Training Sessions. Free and virtual. [Register Here](https://forms.gle/Ez99YtxVptwNCFgN9) Introduction to Mapping and Spatial Analysis in R (Kevin Stierhoff, SWFSC)
* Thurs Feb 24 12-1:30pm Pacific. RGovys Meet-up. Two talks: Automating an ecological data workflow with GitHub Actions and R presented by Jeff Hollister (EPA); Open Science adoption within organizations: Lessons from theories about technology adoption presented by Eli Holmes (NOAA Fisheries); For full details and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/rgovys/events/283793315
* Wed Mar 2 2022 1-4pm EDT. PSAW III Training Sessions. Free and virtual. [Register Here](https://forms.gle/Ez99YtxVptwNCFgN9) Fitting Spatial and Spatiotemporal Models with sdmTMB (Eric Ward, NWFSC)
* Wed Mar 9 2022 1-4pm EDT. PSAW III Training Sessions. Free and virtual. [Register Here](https://forms.gle/Ez99YtxVptwNCFgN9) Fitting Spatial and Spatiotemporal Models with sdmTMB (Eric Ward, NWFSC)

* Wed Feb 9 2022 1-4pm EDT. PSAW III Training Sessions. Part 2. Introduction to FOSSA: Free & Open Source Software for Acoustics (R packages) (Shannon Rankin, SWFSC)
* Wed Feb 16 2022 1-3pm EDT. PSAW III Training Sessions. Creating a Data R Package  (Eli Holmes, NWFSC) [Workshop notes and video](https://rverse-tutorials.github.io/PSAW-2022/)
* Tues Feb 15 10am HI/12pm PT/3pm ET: RStudio Connect Load Testing Christine Stawitz (OST) -  We want to test the ability of the RStudio Connect instance to scale to multiple users. As such, we wanted to set up a time for us to try to use a bunch of the Shiny apps on there simultaneously. Join to learn more about the NMFS R Shiny Connect instance and see if we can break it! 
* Tues Feb 1 2022 12-1pm PST. NMFS R UG Monthly Meeting. Abby Tyrell (NEFSC) gave a presentation on workflow for the Ecosystem and Socioeconomic Profiles. [Slides NOAA access](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/14CnVSQOp2q171obKH1gHHb1bBBblGWLsuMEkPXbFCxU/edit?usp=sharing) [AKesp report repo] (https://github.com/atyrell3/AKesp) [Video NOAA access](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JDJolN2wPOQR55vE4eBiDCEAnJNTEZp9/view?usp=sharing)

[Meeting notes](https://github.com/nmfs-openscapes/NMFS-R-UG-Meetings/tree/main/2022-01-04-targets-package)  [Recording of the session - NOAA access only](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1D8CPg3GDqJt1jwAMn4FoVDThTViHvusr/view?usp=sharing)
* Tue Dec 14th 9am PST. NMFS R UG Special Session Kelly Mayo (NMFS Office of Science and Technology) will be giving a 1 hour tutorial and discussion about manually (via Adobe Acrobat) editing reports to be 508 compliant and talk about how we can use screen readers to check our work.  [Meeting notes](https://github.com/nmfs-openscapes/NMFS-R-UG-Meetings/blob/main/2021-12-14-508-Compliance/Readme.md) [Recording of the session - NOAA access only](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GeHoX9Fq5GWkZmI8Ru7JTDv0V-7M3rE6/view?usp=sharing)

[GitHub Actions repo](https://github.com/nmfs-openscapes/12-07-21-GitHub-Actions) [Recording of the session - NOAA access only](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_oxKuRC-m4kzy57y3PJRfhnYIXXm5nkE/view?usp=sharing)

[Recording of the session - NOAA access only](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-KQd2sur0l1UxWtvl03smYR9WexdzVXZ/view?usp=sharing)
